title: (x) Caetano Veloso + 4hero + others - Progress {Grant}
content:
Hi,   
   
New job ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) This type has been used a lot on cd packages. Check the latest on here (caetano veloso & 4hero Life styles for example). I know I've seen this somewhere...   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/24015.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Stewardson - Adobe Sans substitution font {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2712 "Go to previous forum topic") [Parco logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2714 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adriano

comments.content:
Hey Yves...   
   
The "v" looks modified though.

thanks ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) It seems that almost everytime when I say "I know I've seen this before" I get a T26 font ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif).

\> _The "v" looks modified though._   
   
That because it's not [Enabler](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?image=ALT0000105), it's [Progress](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?image=ALT0000138) - a newer face by Gareth Hague based on the forms he first built into Enabler.

Whose mind does Gareth think he's messing with? Grrr...   
There ought to be law! Once you've designed a face,   
no touchy no feely no revisiting. Makes me look bad.   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
